title: PM felicitates Professor Yunus on swearing in as Bangladesh’s interim govt head
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday felicitated Professor Muhammad Yunus as he took the oath of office of Chief Advisor of Bangladesh’s interim government.
“Heartiest felicitations to Professor Muhammad Yunus on his swearing-in as Chief Adviser of the Government of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh,” the prime minister wrote on his X timeline.
He wished Professor Yunus great success in guiding Bangladesh towards a harmonious and prosperous future.
Prime Minister Shehbaz said that he looked forward to working with him to deepen cooperation between Pakistan and Bangladesh in the days ahead.
